title: Building Performant Web Applications with SvelteKit
excerpt: Learn how SvelteKit can help you build faster, more efficient web applications with less code and better user experience.
content:
SvelteKit is a framework for building web applications of all sizes, with a beautiful development experience and flexible filesystem-based routing.

Why SvelteKit?

SvelteKit is the official Svelte application framework, designed to make it easy to build fast, responsive websites and applications. It offers several advantages:

  • Performance: Svelte compiles your code to highly efficient JavaScript that directly updates the DOM.
  • Simplicity: Straightforward syntax that feels like writing HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
  • Server-side rendering: Built-in support for SSR improves SEO and initial page load times.
  • Progressive enhancement: Works even if JavaScript is disabled.
  • Filesystem-based routing: Intuitive routing that maps directly to your project structure.

Getting Started

Creating a new SvelteKit project is as simple as running:

npm create svelte@latest my-app

This interactive command allows you to choose the features you want in your project, including TypeScript support, ESLint, Prettier, and more.
